shardore.title: Welcome to Shardore!
shardore.description: Shardore is a bustling city situated at the crossroads of trade routes, making it a melting pot of various cultures.

fields.name: Market and Auction Hall
fields.value: The market district is filled with lively merchants and traders, while the residential district offers a quieter atmosphere.

fields.name: Adventurer's Guild Head Quarter
fields.value: A gathering place for those seeking quests and adventures. Here, players can take on various missions, earn rewards, and meet fellow adventurers.

shop.title: Baldrog Emporium
shop.description:
Curated by the master dwarf Baldrog Stonebeard. You can find from weaponry to vast range of items, it's a renowned haven for adventurers dawning their legends.
**Visit here > **<#1211204638255349802>

guild.title: Noble Warheads
guild.description: Emblematic destination for brave travelers. Here, you can meet other explorers, obtain quests, and gain wealth, status and fame.
